name: The Quarterly War
description:
Note: Please play in full screen because the UI does not line up on windowed player.

Description

The Quarterly War is a platformer game where you use a gun to deliver magazines to your loyal fan base. Deliver the magazines to every customer in each level before time runs out to win. The game takes place in a world full of "interesting" people; Customers come in all shapes and sizes. The world is counting on you supporting your magazine empire.

Controls

Left Arrow Key: Move left

Right Arrow Key: Move right

Space Bar: Jump (can also use the up arrow key)

Z: Shoot (can also use the 1 on the number pad)

1: Restart game

Escape: Quit Game
